text: Hi Charlie!  Very nice work!  You are obviously a very ambitious and clever kid :slightly_smiling_face:  How old are you now if you don't mind me asking?
Do you have any ideas about which direction you would like to go in the vfx world?  Games, 3D Animation, live action fx, VR?

Also, do you find that you are attracted more to technical aspects (like the coding you mentioned), or do you prefer animating and modeling and other artistic dicplines?  You obviously have enough time to try many things!

I am an FX Lead at Framestore in Montreal.  I use Houdini everyday to add realistic looking effects to live action movies.  I've also dabbled in other departments and digital media fields but this has been my main job for almost 10 years now!  I can help you with any industry questions you might have as well as Houdini specific questions.  Let me know if I can help in any way!  Nice to meet you.
